contexts.context: “That is why I'm drinking now,” <mark>sighed</mark> Silverthorn. “So tell me, what is your profession?”
...the spell, he suddenly found that all the creaking and <mark>sighing</mark> of the ruins around him had been stilled. He opened...
...much ambition, so little education," said Lledos with a <mark>sigh</mark>. "My dear friends, we aren't mugging some Nord tourist...
